channel.title: Deltascape source duping while trading
channel.description:
Well, as usual, I log on my server, about 50 players on, when i notice something.
Everyone has Dragon claws, max cash, and rares...
I asked who they got from, they said 1 person.
I talked to that person, they told me how they did it...But, how do i make it so even if you click accept then decline where it closes trade?

item.title: Deltascape source duping while trading
item.dc:creator: @I_Yaa_I I Yaa I
item.description:
@I_Yaa_I wrote:

pkpoison:

Same exact problem :S PM me on msn if you find out answer - xskaterx1165@aol.com

OFFTOPIC:
So you did the G-G-G-G-Gravedig?

Read full topic

item.title: Deltascape source duping while trading
item.dc:creator: @Jddogg9 Jddogg9
item.description:
@Jddogg9 wrote:

[quote=“runeite51, post:4, topic:271411”][quote author=I Yaa I link=topic=358157.msg2950515#msg2950515 date=1252466007]
add a trade timer
[/quote]

I hate people like you, it doesn’t help him at all, because there is no tutorial on adding a timer, and he obviously doesn’t know how. You’re just spamming.[/quote]

non spoon feeding community.

Read full topic

Add a timer and it will bloody help.

item.title: Deltascape source duping while trading

item.description:
@12mil wrote:

add a trade timer

I hate people like you, it doesn’t help him at all, because there is no tutorial on adding a timer, and he obviously doesn’t know how. You’re just spamming.
[/quote]

I hate people like you, of course it helps, he doesn’t need a tutorial, he can Google it, even if it’s obvious he doesn’t know how, you’re just spamming.[/quote][quote=“I Yaa I, post:5, topic:271411”][quote author=runeite51 link=topic=358157.msg2950608#msg2950608 date=1252471722]

add a trade timer

I hate people like you, it doesn’t help him at all, because there is no tutorial on adding a timer, and he obviously doesn’t know how. You’re just spamming.
[/quote]

I hate people like you, who depend on the help section to program their server.[/quote]
Well hes right, your not helping me at all, all your chatting bullshit about adding a timer wdf? if your not going to answer dont post, i have this every time on posts and pisses me off.

Read full topic
